# codeTools

代码工具箱，记录关键代码防止重复开发, Github地址: [codeUtils](https://github.com/firstelfin/codeTools)

## Install

```shell
pip install --index-url https://pypi.org/simple codeUtilsElfin
```

## update code

```shell
python3 -m pip install --upgrade build
python -m build
twine upload dist/*
```
